creditline: Gift of the collection of Mari and Irving Lipton
description: X-shaped stand with four C-shaped open cone feet (black at outer edge/openings); square platter with rounded notches at corners for stand feet; central light-colored circle, bordered in black; four radiating light wood segments, bordered in black, at corners
markings: on top of stand, on sticker: AP-1
medium: Huon pine, myrtle burl, medium density fiberboard
signed: on top of stand, in black: ANDREW POTOCNIK  HUON PINE, MYRTLE BURL, M.D.F.
title: Untitled
